recipesJson.name: Cherimoya Melange
recipesJson.author: Echodub
recipesJson.description:
Cherimoya can have a different taste depending on their level of ripeness.
If it's still in it's green state it tastes exotic, sweet, tropical.
The longer it ripes, the more it becomes like a apple yogurt, almost like a apple bircherm√ºsli.
When ripe, a lot of people don't like the taste anymore.

In this recipe, i paired the fresh and tropical taste with VT Yellow Passion Fruit and VT Snakefruit to boost the tropical taste in Cherimoya.
I added FLV Wild Melon and TPA Quince to mellow it out and ad a bit of a watery mouthfeel.
But this recipe has a downside, you need to steep it for 3 days. Freshly mixed, the recipe vapes a bit harsh for my taste.
I use this recipe mostly in an MTL DotAio Setup.
It's just a simple tropical vape without overpowering your sense of smell for a long time
